content:
# We successfully placed the stone furnace at position `(0.0, 0.0)`, and our inventory is now `{'coal': 20, 'stone': 15, 'iron-ore': 10}`.
# The furnace is currently showing warnings indicating it is out of fuel and has no ingredients to smelt.

# To resolve this, we need to insert coal into the furnace for fuel and iron ore for smelting.
# We have 20 coal, so we can insert some into the furnace.

# Let's insert 5 coal into the furnace for fuel.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 coal into the furnace.

# Now, we will insert the 10 iron ore we have into the furnace to start smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert all 10 iron ore.

# After inserting the resources, we should check the status of the furnace.
print(f"Inserted coal and iron ore into the furnace, checking furnace status...")
